name: run-submit-tool-outputs
title: Submit Tool Outputs
description: Submit tool call results to continue a run that is waiting for tool outputs. Use this when a run status is 'requires_action' and the assistant has made tool calls that need responses. Essential for interactive workflows where assistants use tools and need results to continue processing.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread containing the run (format: "thread_abc123...").

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the run to submit tool outputs for (format: "run_abc123..."). Must be in 'requires_action' status.

tool_outputs.description: Array of tool outputs to submit. Each output should correspond to a tool call made by the assistant.

tool_call_id.description: The ID of the tool call this output is for.

output.description: The output/result of the tool call.

examples.title: Submit function call results
examples.description: Provide results for tool calls made by the assistant
